title: ISic000437. Epitaph for Ofillia Proba and L. Ofillius Faustus
body:
Facsimile Images

[Of]illia ((·)) Proba
sibi ((·)) et ((·)) L(ucio) ((·)) Ofillio
Faustó ((·)) patrono

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL 10.7157

English translation

Ofillia Proba (made this) for herself and her patron Lucius Ofillius Faustus

commentary

Reported also in CIL 10.2805 (cf. p. 1009) and CIL 6.23403. The stone has repeatedly been incorrectly attributed to Syracusae, but is originally from Rome.

bibliography

  • 10.7157 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • VIII 683 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002649
